title: How to get class 11 biology notes - Quora

response.answer_text: Okay,so you want 11th class biology notes. In this answer i am going to help to out something differently. Notes are very much important during studies as it reduces the revision time significantly. Notes can be of two types i.e one which is self made and other which is readymade i.e prepared by other. I,personally will recommend you to go for self prepared notes, as they have many benefits,some of them listed below: ●Self notes are prepared according to the style of the reader. So it is very much comfortable for him to revise. ●While preparing the notes,Student will go through the chapter deeply and will try to develop concepts. ●Self notes can be prepared according to the need of the student and in creative manner too. ●To make a visual connection,a student can also decorate the notes with different colour pens. ●Student feels motivated after preparing self notes. ●Preparation of self notes needs a regular effort and so develops a habit to studying regularly.visit this-Abhishek Anand's answer to Why should I study regularly? But instead if you want readymade notes,you can visit the below websites of (cbseguide and aglasem) to find your notes. ●CBSE Revision Notes for CBSE Class 11 Biology ●https://www.google.co.in/amp/s/schools.aglasem.com/1594/amp Thanks for reading. Hope it helped..

I am also in 11 and I am a science student i have taken biology so the first step is our Ncert book you must read it because it is the base everything is in it just you have to read it thoroughly and for more additional information some refrence are their which are available in market But NCERT IS MUST
